Characters
View On FortressMaximus.io

Wheeljack - Weapons Inventor

  1. If I play an Action that puts an Upgrade on one of my Cars, does Wheeljackâ€™s ability trigger?
    Yes. That ability triggers no matter how the Upgrade was put onto one of your Cars.
  2. I play Full Loadout on Wave 1 Wheeljack in Alt Mode. I play Multi-Tool, Multi-Mission Gear, and Field Communicator onto him. How are the triggers handled? Do I resolve each Upgrade and Wheeljack trigger mid-Loadout, or do I wait until I play all three upgrades then resolve the six triggers?
    Full Loadout will put all three upgrades onto Wheeljack. You then handle all of the triggers in an order of your choosing.
